DOC.brief_summary: Study determine effect nevirapine treatment pharmacokinetics ethinyl estradiol ( EE ) /norethindrone ( NET ) .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Potential Pharmacokinetic Interaction Between Nevirapine ( VIRAMUNE ) Ethinyl Estradiol/Norethindrone HIV-1 Infected Women
DOC.mesh_term: Norethindrone acetate , ethinyl estradiol , ferrous fumarate drug combination
DOC.criteria: Female patient age 18 65 year Plasma HIV1 RNA < = 400 copies/mL , document HIV1 infection , within 28 day prior Study Day 0 Lymphocytes Expressing CD4+ Surface Marker ( CD4+ cell count ) > = 100 cells/mm続 within 28 day prior Study Day 0 Patients meet follow laboratory parameter : Lymphocyte count > = 1000 cells/mm続 Hemoglobin > = 9.0 g/dl ( men woman ) Platelet count > = 75000 cells/mm3 Alkaline Phosphatase < = 3.0 time upper limit normal Serum GlutamicOxaloacetic Transaminase ( SGOT ) Serum GlutamicPyruvic Transaminase ( SGPT ) < = 3.0 time upper limit normal Total bilirubin < = 1.5 time upper limit normal Creatinine < = 2mg/dL Female patient reproductive potential must willing use reliable method doublebarrier contraception ( diaphragm spermicidal cream jelly , condom spermicidal foam ) Patients inform willing able comply investigational nature study sign write consent accordance institutional federal guideline Patients stable antiretroviral therapy ( change medication dose ) least thirty day prior study entry continue background study participation Female patient pregnant breastfeed Patients require systemic treatment corticosteroid drug know hepatic enzyme inducer inhibitor within 14 day stud entry ( Study Day 0 ) . Such substance category include : macrolide antibiotic ( erythromycin , clarithromycin ) , azole antifungal ( ketoconazole , fluconazole , itraconazole ) rifampin , rifabutin , phenytoin Patients receive investigational drug within 30 day first dose study medication antineoplastic agent radiotherapy local skin radiotherapy treatment within 12 week start study medication Patients malabsorption , severe chronic diarrhea patient unable maintain adequate oral intake Patients history intravenous drug abuse , alcohol substance abuse consider Investigator Boehringer Ingelheim Pharmaceutical Incorporated ( BIPI ) Medical Monitor significant impairment health compliance Patients undergoing treatment active infection Patients hepatic insufficiency due cirrhosis Patients renal insufficiency Patients heavy smoker ( e.g . > 20 cigarette per day ) Patients currently take Norvir速 ( Ritonavir ) Rescriptor速 ( Delavirdine )
